titles: A comfortable sermon of faith, in temptations and afflictions Preached at S. Botulphes wythout Aldersgate in London, the .xv. of Februarye. 1573. By Maister VVilliam Fulke, Doctor of Diuinitie.
author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.
publisher: By Iohn Awdeley, dwellying in little Brittaine streete without Aldersgate,
notes: Running title reads: A comfortable sermon of fayth, in temptacions and afflictions.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
